# lowerBackPain

**Type Property**

A category type that records lower back pain as a symptom.

## Declaration

```swift
static let lowerBackPain: HKCategoryTypeIdentifier
```

## Discussion

These samples use values from the  [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryValueSeverity] enumeration.
